name: xinquirer
description: Like Inquirer.js but for with dialog windows. node.js API and CLI to to ask user to enter data, dialogs on top of the current window.

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && tsc && cp -rf src/assets dist/src
scripts.start1: rm -rf dist/ && npm run build && electron dist/examples/selectFileSimpleExample.js
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm install && npm run build && npm run doc

author: Sebasti√°n Gurin
